mapper.insert: insert into cskaoyan_mall_feedback (id, user_id, username, mobile, feed_type, content, status, has_picture, pic_urls, add_time, update_time, deleted) VALUES (null, #{uid}, #{username}, #{feedback.mobile}, #{feedback.feedType}, #{feedback.content}, 0, #{feedback.hasPicture}, #{feedback.picUrls}, now(), now(), 0)
